settings.text: Information that needs to be related to investors is highly specific  no matter what your industry is. There is a standard format that investors expect you to follow. Many first time CEOs mistakenly believe that providing data backed results is the key to have a winning deck. However, an investor pitch deck comprises of Market Size, the quality of your team, competitive landscape, intellectual property, revenue projections, partnerships and more. We provide you with a proven and effective investor deck template to make it easy for you to populate the information you need.

Pryro is a team of creative business professionals and entrepreneurs with a wide range of industry experts, who work with businesses across the globe to help them scale. 

We design pitch decks, review decks, evaluate businesses, build financial models and work with them side by side in their fundraising journey.

settings.title: Reliable and Affordable
settings.text: Our membership-based offering is highly affordable. Most pitch deck services charge thousands of dollars. Our average membership is only $89.99 per month!

settings.title: Experienced & Skilled
settings.text: Our team brings decades of experience from working with VCs, Incubators and experts across multiple industries

settings.title: Traction
settings.text: We have helped several businesses on the path to success. We believe pitch deck alone is not enough to prepare you to be investor ready. Our intensive tutorials provide you with the skills you need to pitch any investor.

settings.tab_content:
• Start your project on our website and you will be assigned to an appropriate expert within our “Founders’ Dashboard” that you can access using your login details.
  • You will also get access to a dedicated customer area to track order status, upload or provide feedback, and chat with your assigned expert.

• Our team works with you to understand your current situation and what your objectives are.
  • In this stage, we have a virtual session where we will bounce ideas on the best route to take for your goals to be met.

• At this point, we have delivered first draft and would require your feedback
  • We provide 2 drafts for each project and if you require other additional revisions, you can always inform us

• We provide you with a modern and professional deck in terms of copy and visuals ready to impress and make lasting impact.
  • Our delivery includes, a fully editable version PPT and a PDF copy of your presentation with all the rights to use on any medium If you require a different format, kindly mention it in your order. ​

settings.heading: Pitch Deck Design Process
settings.description: The PDS team has a standard flow for almost every project with few exceptions and we have been very successful with the implementation on every count

settings.question: How long does it take to get a first draft?
settings.answer: After our first meeting, clients usually would receive a first draft under 72hrs

settings.question: How can I provide feedbacks/comments on the projects (designs)?
settings.answer: you can provide feedback in real-time using our cutting-edge web application built for entrepreneurs Login here

settings.question: Will you treat my presentation as confidential?
settings.answer: Yes. Confidentiality and data security are given top priority at Pitch Deck Services. Your account manager advises you with respect to an optional non-disclosure agreement (NDA).

settings.question: Do I need a credit card to use PDS?
settings.answer: We accept payments through Credit/Debit cards and Paypal on our website. If you want to pay with another option, kindly get in touch with us.

settings.question: Can I edit the final presentation myself?
settings.answer: Yes. You will receive a fully editable PowerPoint version of the document. We also provide Google Slides at your request.

settings.question: When will I receive my presentation?
settings.answer: After you have received the first draft, and you provided feedback, you would receive the completed version in the next 1-5days based on the level complexity

settings.question: Will I be able to print the document?
settings.answer: Yes. All the documents can be printed, sent as email or used on large screens.

settings.question: Will I be able speak with someone?
settings.answer:
Yes. For every package that you order on our platform, a dedicated customer manager will be assigned to you.

You schedule a call here
